Package dataAccess

Class DataAccess

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.DataAccess
public class DataAccess extends Object
It implements the data access to the objectDb database

  • Method Details

    • initializeDB

      public void initializeDB()
      This is the data access method that initializes the database with some events and questions. This method is invoked by the business logic (constructor of BLFacadeImplementation) when the option "initialize" is declared in the tag dataBaseOpenMode of resources/config.xml file

    • createQuestion

      public Question createQuestion(Event event, String question, float betMinimum) throws QuestionAlreadyExist
      This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
      Parameters:
      event - to which question is added
      question - text of the question
      betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
      Returns:
      the created question, or null, or an exception
      Throws:
      QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

    • getEvents

      public Vector<Event> getEvents(Date date)
      This method retrieves from the database the events of a given date
      Parameters:
      date - in which events are retrieved
      Returns:
      collection of events

    • getEventsMonth

      public Vector<Date> getEventsMonth(Date date)
      This method retrieves from the database the dates a month for which there are events
      Parameters:
      date - of the month for which days with events want to be retrieved
      Returns:
      collection of dates

    • open

      public void open(boolean initializeMode)

    • existQuestion

      public boolean existQuestion(Event event, String question)

    • close

      public void close()
